data.title: Towson University Athletics
data.meta_description: Randall Harris (62) Offensive Guard  - Returning starter at right tackle who had an outstanding season in 2012 ... one of the keys to the Tigers’ offensive
data.text:
Returning starter at right tackle who had an outstanding season in 2012 ... one of the keys to the Tigers’ offensive success last season ... earned All-Colonial Athletic Association first team honors ... made tremendous improvement during career ... has gotten bigger and stronger over the last three seasons ... has also made tremendous strides academically ... very fast, very athletic lineman with great size ... can also play guard ... has appeared in 25 career games and started 19 times ... freshman red-shirt in 2009.

2012 SEASON: Named first team All-CAA notice along with the Tigers’ other tackle Eric Pike ... earned starting position at right tackle in pre-season ... responded with an outstanding season ... started all 11 games for CAA co-champions.

2011 SEASON: Tigers’ regular starter at left guard ... played in 11 games and started eight times ... sat out Villanova win with an injury ... starter at left guard in final seven games ... one of the keys to the Tigers’ offensive line play which enabled Towson to average 229.9 rushing yards per game.

2010 SEASON: Appeared in three games as a reserve offensive tackle.

AT DUVAL H.S.: Honorable mention All-State defensive end ... second team All-County twice ... made 108 career tackles for Coach Dameon Powell with 11 sacks and recovered 7 fumbles ... forced 4 fumbles ... scored 4 touchdowns as running back ... made 57 tackles and 6 sacks as senior ... made 41 tackles with 4 sacks as a junior ... high school teammate of Tiger offensive tackle Eric Pike.
